name: MacBook Pro
description: A premium, high-performance marketing landing page for the MacBook Pro, built with Next.js, React Three Fiber, and GSAP. This project showcases modern web development techniques, featuring interactive 3D models and smooth, scroll-triggered animations.

name: KuroX
description: A modern, high-performance anime discovery platform built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Explore trending series, search for your favorites, and dive into detailed anime information with a beautiful, premium dark interface.

name: GamePortal
description: GamePortal is a modern, responsive web application that serves as a hub for discovering and playing free online games. Built with React and Next.js, it features a sleek design, smooth animations, and an intuitive interface for browsing a wide variety of games.

name: DishDrop
description: DishDrop is a modern, responsive web application designed to help food enthusiasts discover, explore, and cook delicious recipes from around the world. Built with vanilla JavaScript and powered by TheMealDB API, DishDrop offers an intuitive interface for browsing thousands of recipes, ingredients, and cuisines.

name: CarCrafters
description: CarCrafters is a modern, premium car dealership and rental platform built with cutting-edge web technologies. The platform offers an immersive browsing experience with stunning animations, interactive 3D car previews, and a fully responsive design optimized for all devices.

name: KnokKnok
description: KnokKnok is a comprehensive network and security scanning tool that provides various functionalities for network reconnaissance, web scanning, and information gathering.

name: Movie Night App
description: Movie Night - your ultimate companion for discovering and tracking movies and TV shows! This modern mobile application is built with React Native and Expo, offering a seamless experience for movie enthusiasts.

name: PlayStation Café Management System
description: PlayStation Café Management System is a comprehensive solution for managing a PlayStation gaming café. It includes features for user registration, game management, and session tracking.

name: DTMF_Detection
description: DTMF_Detection is a Python-based application for detecting Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) signals in audio files. It utilizes libraries such as NumPy and WAV for efficient audio processing.

name: RESTIFY
description: A Windows-friendly work/rest timer with keyboard lock during rest

name: Movie Night
description: Movie Night is a responsive web app for discovering movies, from trending blockbusters to hidden gems. It features cast details, ratings, and summaries in a sleek dark theme optimized for all devices.

name: Archer E-Bank
description: A modern, full-stack digital banking application. Archer enables users to register, log in, manage virtual Visa cards, transfer money, request payments, and receive real-time notifications—all in a sleek, responsive interface.

name: Katalog
description: Katalog is a heartfelt digital legacy platform that allows users to create, store, and deliver personal messages to their loved ones after their passing.

name: ATOM Hospital
description: ATOM-Hospital is a project for managing hospital operations, including patient and staff management, appointment scheduling, and healthcare workflows.

name: Coffee Break
description: Coffee Break - Cozy Coffee Shop Website is a modern, responsive website designed for a coffee shop, featuring an elegant layout, menu display, and user-friendly navigation. It provides an inviting online presence for coffee enthusiasts.

name: Burger Smash
description: A modern, interactive burger restaurant website built with Next.js, featuring stunning 3D graphics, smooth animations, and a responsive design.

name: qrcode-gen-master
description: qrcode-gen-master is a web application that allows users to generate QR codes easily. It features a user-friendly interface and supports various customization options for QR codes.

name: Administration Panel
description: A financial administration panel that allows users to track payments, calculate balances, manage financial records, and search transactions.

name: Noble Plate
description: Noble Plate is a modern, responsive restaurant website that highlights fine dining with elegant design and easy navigation. It offers users an engaging look at the restaurant’s brand, menu, and ambiance.

name: EchoPress
description: EchoPress is a modern, responsive blog website that emphasizes clean design and user-friendly navigation. It provides an engaging platform for users to explore various topics, read articles, and interact with content.

name: Link-Archive
description: A modern, responsive web app to store, search, and manage your favorite links

name: Coupa Volunteers Force
description: Coupa Volunteers Force is a web application designed to facilitate volunteer management and coordination. It features a user-friendly interface for both volunteers and organizers, enabling easy sign-ups, event management, and communication.
